ygData.subject: twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: i know what twinking is i have done it once but i dont know if it a banable offence. i had a 15th lvl rogue (redspider) but i was also a +pvp and by 15th lvl i
ygData.messageBody:
i know what twinking is i have done it once but i dont know if it a
banable offence. i had a 15th lvl rogue (redspider) but i was also a
+pvp and by 15th lvl i was sick of it (btw i never killed another player
nor had i ever been killed by another) so i got together with one of my
guildmates and i gave him all of the stuff red owned and then proceeded
to delete red (SOB, SOB) then created redspider all over again, i then
went to my guildmate and he gave me all of my stuff so here i was a 1st
lvl rogue with all of the stuff that a 15th lvl rogue had earned, THAT
my friends is twinking but i did it for a good reason others do it
because they are bored with their current character and so give all of
their stuff to a new character and play like that, and dont delete their
old characer so if they want to play that old characer all they have to
do is trade the stuff back to it. (sorry about my horrible grammer
skills, one long run-on sentece after the other) that i look down on but
i would not say it is a bad thing just not for me.


till next time this is your friendly neiborhood homo
Jose aka Redspider
